name: Ext_R2_ReferralRequest_requester
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.ReferralRequest.requester for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ReferralRequest.requester from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ReferralRequest|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Requester of referral / transfer of care
element.definition: The healthcare provider or provider organization who/which initiated the referral/transfer of care request. Can also be  Patient (a self referral).
element.comment: `ReferralRequest.requester` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.requester`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
